content: DD 500-CA Core drill Three-phase heavy-duty diamond coring machine with high-frequency motor and optional auto-feed unit for rig-based concrete coring from 82-600 mm (3-7/32 - 23-5/8”) in diameter ### Categories: Home > Products > Power tools > Diamond coring- - - ### FEATURES:Features Powerful high-frequency motor with electronic speed control for optimum power delivery over the entire diameter range Compatible with the DD AF-CA automatic feed unit that makes drilling a highly efficient and fully automated process Iron Boost: for a quick performance boost with increased torque when drilling through rebar Thanks to IP 55 water spray protection, drilling can be carried out under adverse conditions Operation within the optimum power band, for peak performance and longer core bit life, is easy with the aid of the LED power indicators Applications Drilling through-holes and penetrations Manhole openings Deep hole drilling Stitch coring for installing cable trays Large openings for water drainage pipes etc. ### TECHNICAL DATA: Diameter range: 3-7/32 - 23-5/8 in Base material: Concrete, Reinforced concrete Operation mode: Rig-based drilling system Technical Data | Diameter range | 3-7/32 - 23-5/8 in | Base material | Concrete, Reinforced concrete | Operation mode | Rig-based drilling system | Number of gears | 10 | No load RPM | gear 4: 571 rpm; gear 5: 510 rpm; gear 6: 429 rpm; gear 7: 367 rpm; gear 8: 327 rpm; gear 9: 265 rpm | Weight according EPTA-Procedure 01/2003 without battery | 36.6 lb | Weight of complete system | 82 lb | Dimensions (LxWxH) | 23.9 x 7.6 x 8.5 in | A-weighted emission sound pressure level | 100 dB (A) | 1 | Tri. vibr. value for drilling into concrete (wet) with diamond core A (ah,DD) | 4.5 m/s² | According to the applicable product standard (see the Operating Instruction for more details) ### ITEMS- 3536966 - DD500-CA BS motor w/ with cut assist pkg - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x DD 500-CA 480V Diamond coring tool assy - 1x Spacer DD-HD30-SP - 1x Gardena water connector (female) - 1x Chuck DD-BS DD 200 - 1x Wheel set DD-HD30-W - 1x Drilling stand DD-HD 30 - 1x DD AF-CA 240V Autofeed unit assy - 3536964 - DD500-CA BS motor with spacer - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x DD 500-CA 480V Diamond coring tool assy - 1x Spacer DD-HD30-SP - 1x Gardena water connector (female) - 1x Chuck DD-BS DD 200
